OOC: Where's Killfest??? are Missile-seekers allowed?

Perceptor's Shuttle/SharpClaws's Shuttle::

Perceptor avoided the shot and he shot 25 times agaisnt Grimmler's 
shuttle, Sharpclaws's shuttle appeared and shot agaisnt Grimmler (25 
shots)


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Um, Airly, there are like 6 or so Maximal shuttles.
> 
> Oh, and SoulStice, the battle is up in space. Your bots would have 
to 
> take the CF shuttles to get to it.
> 
> ::Grimmler/Fliq/Greven/Demise::
> 
> Laser shots fly by Grimmler and Fliq's shuttle, several hitting but 
> not doing too much damage. Grimmler manuevers the shuttle around, 
> firing repeatedly at Perceptor's shuttle.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Greven and Demise both activate their space jets, flying toward the 
> group of Maximals that were firing at them. Greven fires two 
> missiles, the seeking systems of them choosing random targets and 
> streaming toward them.
> 
> Greven's shuttle gets in range of the Maximals as the shots hit it. 
> Something clicks inside the main comp, the entire shuttle exploding 
> in a giant fireball.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Perceptor/Underground/Scorpyo::
> > 
> > The shuttle with Perceptor and co. was arriving when they saw 
> > Maximals's shuttle (Special circuits advice Perceptor, remember 
> he's 
> > Blind). "Open FIRE!!!!!" screamed Perceptor. The shuttle shot 25 
> times
> > 
> > Chamaleon/Charon/Deepfear/Sharpclaws.
> > 
> > Sharpclaws had arrived when other shuttle was ready. Sharpclaws, 
> > charon and Deepfear was inside. The shutle left the base.
